body_html:
I was able to solve the problem now too.
But the solution for me was to complete reinstall my ubuntu and only install tensorflow on the blank system.

@1Mr-Styler nvidia-modprobe didnt solve it for me.
Im not sure why nvidia-smi has shown an ECC error because now its working perfectly without any nvidia-smi error

body:
I was able to solve the problem now too.
But the solution for me was to complete reinstall my ubuntu and only install tensorflow on the blank system.

@1Mr-Styler nvidia-modprobe didnt solve it for me.
Im not sure why nvidia-smi has shown an ECC error because now its working perfectly without any nvidia-smi error
